CustomField.description: This long text field is automatically populated upon the deactivation of a Customer Portal User. It is used to capture all of the records to which the Portal User had sharing access.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This long text field is automatically populated upon the deactivation of a Customer Portal User. It is used to capture all of the records to which the Portal User had sharing access.
CustomField.label: Customer Portal Sharing History
